content: the document was open for comments previously but i changed it to view only because edits were being made accidentally if you have comments or edit suggestions please comment here and i will make the updates to the document more notes are at the beginning of the pattern you will need a gray or black yarn for the border row but all other colors should be a rainbow from purple for coolest to red for hottest before beginning do research on your chosen location and decide which temperature you ll be using highs lows specific time of day etc don t purchase too much of one color at first bigger blankets than the standard pattern will require more yarn especially in the colors that are used most caron simply soft is the recommended yarn for the pattern but any yarn that has a lot of color choices is fine use the recommended hook size for your particular yarn or go up/down depending on your gauge and the size of blanket you want if you use a heavy yarn like the one-pound yarns do fewer repeats of the diamond pattern because your blanket will be bigger by default any additions or changes to the pattern/notes after publication will be noted
